md:
giải nghĩa từ "ceramic" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.
Ceramic /səˈræmɪk/ (adjective)
- Meaning: made of or relating to ceramics (materials made from clay and other minerals, often used to make pottery, tiles, and other objects)
+ Example: The ceramic vase was very delicate and expensive.
+ Related words: ceramics, pottery, clay, tile

Ceramic /səˈræmɪk/ (noun)
- Meaning: a material made from clay and other minerals, often used to make pottery, tiles, and other objects
+ Example: The artist worked with ceramic to create a beautiful sculpture.
+ Related words: ceramics, pottery, clay, tile

Note: The word "ceramic" can be used as both an adjective and a noun. As an adjective, it describes something made of or relating to ceramics. As a noun, it refers to the material itself.
